LabCAS-DataAcquisitionDate.description: Date on which data were acquired according to eLabFTW record

LabCAS-Project.description: The project to which the experiment belongs

ErrorFlag.description: Indicates if a known error appears in the dataset

TemplateName.description: Read-only field used to indicate which template was used

ErrorFlag.description: Indicates if a known error appears in the dataset

TemplateName.description: Read-only field used to indicate which template was used

AcquisitionTime.description: Data acquisition time as set by instrument

AcquistionVolume.description: Data acquisition volume as set by instrument

BeadLotNumber_ConcentrationQC.description: Lot number of beads used for quality control of concentration measurements

BeadLotNumber_SizeQC.description: Lot number of beads used for quality control of size measurements

ErrorFlag.description: Indicates if a known error appears in the dataset

CellVolume.description: Volume of cell stock added to acquisition vessel

CFUMethod.description: Describes deposition format of cells on agar plate

CoreDataPath.description: Portion of the data pathway that will not change as the template is used to generate experimental records (should be network-resolvable)

CoulterAperatureSize.description: Aperture installed on Coulter counter during measurement

DiluentName.description: Which diluent was used to suspend cells for acquisition (linked item)

DiluentVolume.description: Volume of diluent added to acquisition vessel

FCAcquisitionCountTarget.description: Set number of events to acquire in a particular gate on flow cytometer

FCAcquisitionThresholdChannel.description: Which channel as named by the manufacturer was used to threshold the data acquisition?

FCAcquisitionThresholdValue.description: Threshold value in arbitrary units that defines the lower limit of data acquisition in flow cytometry

FCAcquisitionTime.description: Set time of data acquisition on flow cytometer

FCFlowRateSetting.description: Set flow rate of data acquisition on flow cytometer
FCFlowRateSetting.$comment: THIS SHOULD PROBABLY USE THE µ SYMBOL

FCFluorescentChannels.description: List of fluorescent channels acquired during a flow cytometry experiment as named by the manufacturer (separated by semicolons)

FCInjectionMode.description: Sample acquisition format in flow cytometer

FixationMethod.description: Specific treatment applied to cells to prevent future changes

FluorescentProbe.description: Fluorescent probe(s) used in experiment as named in the eLabFTW database (linked item)

GrowthDuration.description: Time in hours that cells were incubated to encourage growth

GrowthMediaName.description: Name of media used to culture cells (linked item)

IncubationAgitation.description: Speed of agitation that cells were incubated during an experiment

IncubationAtmosphere.description: Atmosphere that cells were incubated in to encourage growth

IncubationDuration.description: Time in minutes that cells were incubated during an experiment

IncubationTemperature.description: Temperature in oC that cells were incubated in during an experiment or culture
IncubationTemperature.$comment: THIS SHOULD PROBABLY USE THE DEGREE SYMBOL (°)

KitLotNumber.description: The lot number of any relevant kits

LabCAS-DataAcquisitionDate.description: Date on which data were acquired according to eLabFTW record

LabCAS-MicrobialMaterialID.description: Cell material(s) used in experiment as named in the eLabFTW database (linked item)

LabCAS-Project.description: Name of project that experiment supports (linked item)

LibraryPrep.description: Name of specific kit used for sequencing preparation steps

QCReagentLotNumber.description: The lot number if a QC reagent was used

SamplePurposeCodes.description: Generic types of controls contained in the dataset

SpecificDataPath.description: Portion of the data pathway specific to data from a given experimental record (should be a sub-path of the location specified by `CoreDataPath`)

TransmissionMode.description: Which microscope transmission modes were used

elab_item_link.title: eLabFTW item link

id.description: The integer identifier for this item used by this eLabFTW instance

url.description: A (resolvable) URL for accessing this item via a web browser

api_url.description: A URL for accessing this item via the eLabFTW API

title.description: A short description of this item

category_title.description: The name of the category for this item (called an "item type") in eLabFTW

type.description: Whether this item is a resource (database item) or an experiment

elab_item_link.description: A data type representing a link to an item (experiment or resource) in an eLabFTW instance

userid.description: The identifier number for this user in the eLabFTW instance

base_url.description: The URL of the ELabFTW instance in which the user is registered
